snippet: Oil prices reversed course on Monday, edging up after Iraq's oil minister said OPEC would likely need to extend its production cuts into the second half of 2017....

headline.main: Oil Edges Up After Iraq Urges Extension of OPEC Cuts
headline.print_headline: Oil Edges Up After Iraq Urges Extension of OPEC Cuts

lead_paragraph: Oil prices reversed course on Monday, edging up after Iraq's oil minister said OPEC would likely need to extend its production cuts into the second half of 2017.
